content.rendered:
Directed by Nelson Dilipkumar

Written by Nelson Dilipkumar

Star Joseph Vijay (Veeraraghavan). Pooja Hegde (Preethi). K. Selvaraghavan (Altaf Hussain). Shine Tom Chacko (Malik). Yogi Babu (Jill). Redin Kingsley (Jack). Vtv Ganesh (Dominic Irudhayaraj). Shaji Chen (Home Minister). Aparna Das (Aparna). Sathish Krishnan (Ramachandran). Lilliput (Umar Farooq). Ankur Vikal (Umar Saif). Sunil Reddy (Mahaali). Shiva Aravind (Killi). Sujatha Babu (Sujatha). Prudhviraj (Doctor). Subbalakshmi (Nosy Grandma). Cell Murugan (Murugan).Nelson Dilipkumar .Anirudh Ravichander .Jani .Bjorn Surrao

Language Tamil

Producers Abhay S. Dutta. Kalanidhi Maran. Sumit S. Rajput. Hari Vishnu

Production Sun Pictures
